name: UITextInteractionDelegate
desc: An interface that an object implements to receive information about text interaction events.

items.name: func interactionShouldBegin(UITextInteraction, at: CGPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether the text interaction should begin.

items.name: func interactionWillBegin(UITextInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the text interaction will begin.

items.name: func interactionDidEnd(UITextInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the text interaction ended.
